sections.paragraph: + The head of a house of the half tribe of Manasseh beyond Jordan, a man of renown. (1 Chronicles 5:24) (B.C. 741.) + A Naphtalite, ancestor of Jerimoth, the head of the tribe at the time of David's census. (1 Chronicles 27:19) (B.C. 1015.) + The father of Seraiah, an officer of Jehoiakim. (Jeremiah 36:26) (B.C. 605.)
